title: Unable to Connect to Chat (In Client)
body:
Hi, I recently logged into my account & found that I am suddenly unable to reconnect to the chat in client. (Unable to view friends list, messages, or game invites). This issue has never been a problem for me in the past, so it is quite unusual that it is occurring all of a sudden. 


Wanted to know if there is anyone else having this odd issue at the moment? (I do believe there was a server outage a few hours ago, but the servers were promptly fixed & online soon after) 

Most of my friends all say their clients are fine now & can view their friends list / messages / etc. 
Any quick fix to this solution? or is it recommended I simply wait until it reconnects itself. 

Thanks

replies.body: Sometimes you just need to update your port forwarding to make sure the chat connection is able to get through successfully. Check out [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq8), and let me know if that helps. If not we can do a few more detailed troubleshooting steps!
